attributes.action: ENFORCE POOR LIGHTING ON CARS LORRIES-STOP NONE LEGAL LENSES-ONLY WHITE FRONT- RED REAR WITH AMBER TURNING
attributes.additional_details: THERE HAS BEEN AN INCREASE WITH `BOYRACERS` CHANGING LENSES TO VERY DARK WITH BRAKE LIGHTS SHOWING LIKE SIDE LIGHTS, ALSO BLUE LIGHTS, LIGHTS IN THE WINDOWS ECT, THE ONLY LEGAL ONES ARE WHITE AT THE FRONT WITH RED AT THE REAR AND AMBER FOR TURNING, THERE ARE MANY WHO CHANGE THINGS TO THERE OWN LIKING, THIS MAY MAKE INSURANCE VOID IF THEY HAVE NOT INFORMED THEM, MOT STATIONS SHOULD PICK THIS UP AND THE TRAFFIC POLICE WHO APPEARS NOT TO, THESE ISSUES CAN CAUSE AN ACCIDENT.
